Module camp_management_and_application_system
Package services

Class CampStaffService

java.lang.Object
services.CampStaffService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICampStaffService
public class CampStaffService extends Object implements ICampStaffService
CampStaffService implements ICampStaffService interface and provide camp functions in the role permission of a staff
